name: goodbye
desc: The server intends to close the connection soon.
long_desc: The goodbye event may be sent by a server that expects it will close the connection after an unspecified amount of time. A well formed client should reconnect to avoid data loss. Other scenarios where you might encounter the goodbye event are: When an event occurs, we will send an HTTP POST request to your Request URL. The outer payload is uniform across all Events API methods, and contains fields like team_id and event. Learn more
